en-US.name: Garage Lights
en-US.summary: Control your garage LED light strips with Alexa
en-US.description: Garage Lights allows you to control your LED light strips using voice commands. Turn lights on/off, adjust brightness, change colors, and set patterns like fire, rainbow, candle, and more.
examplePhrases: Alexa, turn on the garage lights
Alexa, set garage lights to 50 percent
Alexa, set garage lights to fire mode

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: 1. Link your account using your Garage Lights credentials. 2. Say 'Alexa, discover devices' to find your LED strips. 3. Control lights with voice commands.
